name: Greensquare
description: Greensquare focuses on textile recycling services for organisations and household. Their objective is to double the current textile recycling rate from 7% to 14% by 2020. They are committed to educating Singapore's population on the 3R (Reduce, Reuse, Recycle), especially the youth in schools. Greensquare focuses on textile recycling services for organisations and household.
